Format._description: Are there formatting errors in the generated text?

Grammar._description: Does the generated text differ from expected text in grammar only?

Completeness._description: Is the generated answer missing important information?

Specificity._description: Is the answer not specific enough? Too specific?
_examples: expected answer is the sum of the generated answer

Bugs._description: Does the generated text return obvious bugs in the code?
_examples: mismatching expected text vs generated text data types

Careless Mistake._description: Was there a small oversight when answering the question?
